name: The green boots of Lucifer
data: It increases the users strength adequately.
It decreases the users constitution pathetically.
It decreases the users wisdom pathetically.
It increases the users intelligence adequately.
It has nice armour class for its type (tiny in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration poorly.
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration poorly.
It gives decent bonus to the skill 'tonal control'.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It affects the skill tonal control.
They seem to be hot to touch.
